function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proximity of green spaces to the place of residence affecting frequency and popularity may lead to overcrowding and increased risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to overcrowding in popular green spaces.","Mitigation":"Implement crowd control measures, promote less crowded green spaces, and encourage staggered visiting hours.","Technologies":"Smartphone apps for crowd monitoring, public announcement systems for informing visitors.","People":"Residents, visitors, and tourists of Krak\\u00f3w.","Owner":"Local government, park management authorities."},{"Description":"Usage of green spaces located in the city centre indicates willingness to cover larger distances, leading to increased movement and potential spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased movement and potential spread of diseases due to travel to city centre green spaces.","Mitigation":"Promote the use of local green spaces, improve amenities in local neighborhoods, and provide incentives for staycation activities.","Technologies":"Geolocation tracking, community engagement apps, and public health awareness campaigns.","People":"Residents, visitors, and tourists of Krak\\u00f3w.","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Avoidance of green spaces during different phases of the COVID-19 pandemic indicates concerns about disease transmission and may lead to reduced outdoor activity and social isolation.","Impact":"Reduced outdoor activity and social isolation due to avoidance of green spaces.","Mitigation":"Educate the public on safe outdoor activities, improve sanitation and hygiene facilities in green spaces, and promote outdoor socialization within safety guidelines.","Technologies":"Digital health platforms, contactless facilities, and community engagement apps.","People":"Residents and visitors of Krak\\u00f3w.","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities."}]}
